title: Bannou Yasai Ninninman
synopsis: Mari is a young elementary schooler who is terrified of two things—eating vegetables and crossing "Fear'a Bridge"—so much so that she has recurring nightmares of being forced to confront her fears. She avoids eating vegetables at all costs, and wakes up early so she and her friend Momo can walk out of their way to avoid the bridge.
staff: [['Horikawa, Kenji', ['Producer']], ['Yoshihara, Masayuki', ['Director', ' Script', ' Planning', ' Character Design']], ['Aketagawa, Jin', ['Sound Director']], ['Hayashi, Yuuki', ['Music']]]
